data.title: Great BBQ!
data.text: This place has great BBQ and everything is homemade, the various BBQ sauces, even the mayo for the slaw and the buns for the sandwiches! Great for takeout or casual dine-in. We especially love the focus of honoring the military here (appropriate since the owner was a Marine).

owner_response.author: TGBBQ, Owner at That Good BBQ, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Kim,
  Thank you for stopping in.  I am glad you enjoyed our place and the food.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Appropriately named
data.text: One of the best BBQ places in Suffolk.  Do their own cooking and make their own sauces.  Yum  You'll want some to take home!

owner_response.author: TGBBQ, Owner at That Good BBQ, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Kathleen, 
 Thank you for the kind words and I am very pleased that you were happy with our food.

Semper Fi -
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: MMMM BBQ
data.text: Home made BBQ, rolls, sides, cookies... and a down home atmosphere... what's not to love? And you can customize your BBQ with one of their 4 unique BBQ sauces.

owner_response.author: TGBBQ, Owner at That Good BBQ, responded to this review
owner_response.text: I am very glad to hear you enjoyed the food.  We truly appreciate you stopping in.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Proud this is in Suffolk restaurant
data.text:
My wife and I stopped for lunch after passing this place by for a couple of months.   Man we didn't know what we were missing.  I ordered the brisket platter with beans and slaw. I expected typical slices of brisket and was pleasantly surprised to find it served almost pulled like NC pork. It was so tender it almost melted in my mouth.    Adding the bourbon and bacon sauce made it outstanding.   The beans had a full smokey taste and the slaw was dry, not runny.   

Being a retired service member I appeciated the decor and atmosphere.  All five branches of the military are represented here.   Photos, caps, and flags abound.   Pause at the missing man table  on the way out for a moment of silent thanks to those who have not yet returned home.  

Thank you for this fine establishment brother.   Semper Fi...Semper Paratus!

owner_response.author: TGBBQ, Owner at That Good BBQ, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for coming in.  Very happy you were satisfied with the meal.  Semper Fi and thank you for your service.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Pretty good
data.text:
I always rate a place by value. Harpers is pretty good in fact from time to time it's better than that it's really good.

However they aren't bashful about the pricing and when it's not "really good" can be a little pricey. Definitely worth a shot I know some folks that are big fans.

owner_response.author: TGBBQ, Owner at That Good BBQ, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Paul - I am trying to make sure we are the restaurant you are reviewing.  This review is about Harpers Table from the paragraph I read.  The review came to THAT GOOD BBQ and posted on our page.. If you are reviewing us please let me know so I can find out what we can do to make your next visit better.  Thank you, Barry Day
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: BEST burnt ends & Mimi's banana pudding a must!
data.text:
The title says it all! The burnt ends here are even better than the BBQ in Kansas City! So moist and delicious!  
I have no idea how they make their banana pudding, but it is the best I've ever tasted! The putting is light and fluffy, with fresh bananas and Nila wafers. I could have that for lunch every day!
Staff is uber friendly & helpful.  A real gem in downtown Suffolk!

owner_response.author: TGBBQ, Owner at That Good BBQ, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for stopping in.  I am very glad you enjoyed your meal and we greatly appreciate your business.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent
data.text: This was absolutely the best bbq that I have ever eaten. The sauces are made by them and all the sides were very good. Excellent prices as well. Had a bbq pork plate with slaw, baked beans, roll, and hush puppies for under $8.

owner_response.author: TGBBQ, Owner at That Good BBQ, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for visiting us.  Very happy to know you enjoyed your meal and thank you for taking the time to review us here.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent brisket
data.text: Rating barbeque is very subjective but I thought their brisket platter was excellent.  Meal comes with two sides plus hush puppies and a very large roll.  I chose slaw and baked beans for sides.  Baked beans were smoky good.  Slaw was drier, less sweet than most places but fresh.  Brisket was super tender with a great smoky taste.  Served with no sauce but there are several options on the table.  I really liked the bourbon bacon sauce.   If I lived in the area this would be a regular stop.

owner_response.author: TGBBQ, Owner at That Good BBQ, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for dining with us and the review.  Glad you enjoyed it and we hope to see you sometime in the future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent Barbecue and a home to veterans
data.text:
Stopped by for lunch and found an excellent selection of barbecue.  Everything from sandwiches to plates to barbecue by the pound.  We had sample plates and the servings were huge.  You'll find barbecued pork, beef brisket and chicken but no ribs.  They come with two sides, hush puppies and an equally huge roll that lets you turn the meat into a sandwich.  The mac & cheese comes highly recommended.  On the table, you'll find a wide variety of sauces that range from Carolina sauce to mustard sauce to several types of western sauce.  They have several Virginia beers on tap in addition to tea and soft drinks.  They also cater.

The owner is a retired Marine and you'll see signs of it throughout the restaurant.  You'll find a "Missing Man" table near the door and it's worth a stop on the way out to read about it. He has specials for veterans and vets will find a home here.  Well worth the trip from other cities in Hampton Roads.

data.title: Awesome tribute to service members KIA
data.text:
In town for business looked up where to eat and decided on bbq.
Cool place, nice staff. Went for dinner 2 nights in a row. Food is good but no ribs. Portion size is good and reasonably priced. Especially impressed by the table setting for service members that have given their lives for our freedom. Never seen that before. Check it out. Definitely worth stopping and supporting whoever thought that was a good idea. 🇺🇸

data.title: Working Lunch
data.text: We stopped by today to check this out prior to a vendor visit next week.The food was excellent.The brisket was flavorful and tender cooked 16 to 20 hours large portion.The pulled pork sandwich was moist and large. It passed our prescreening and has been selected for next weeks visit from european vendors.Friendly staff reasonable prices with unique decor. Worth a visit. The hours of operation change so check to be safe.

data.title: Good bbq here
data.text: This restaurant on West Washington Street downtown Suffolk has changed hands several times. But, we hope this one is a keeper. If you enjoy bbq, I think you'll like this place. I ordered a pork sandwich, which was quite large, and ate the whole thing! People are friendly and helpful. Take out is available. Don't come too late (or be sure to call ahead), because they do run out!

owner_response.author: TGBBQ, Owner at That Good BBQ, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for visiting us and we appreciate your positive review.

Barry
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great BBQ!
data.text: I visited this restaurant while in Suffolk on business. I went here for lunch and dinner. The staff is extremely friendly. The bbq is full of flavor. The smoked Mac n cheese is to die for. The beef brisket is perfectly flavored. I will visit again!

data.title: Fantastic food and atmosphere
data.text: Stopped by while passing through the area looking for good Tidewater Virginia BBQ. Found this delicious place with cool rustic but hip decor. Loved it!

data.title: Great BBQ Find
data.text:
We were in Suffolk for an appointment and decided to have lunch. There is little that I am familiar with and the two restaurants I know only are open for dinner. Living in Williamsburg where we have many chains I try to support our local restaurants. I do the same when I am away from home. 

We began our search and found That Good BBQ with reviews on Trip Advisor and it looked like something to check out. I pulled up their website and found it very interesting and we headed to find it.

We were warmly greeted, went to the counter to order after looking at the menu. I decided to have the pork barbecue plate which came with two sides. I chose smoked macaroni and cheese, coleslaw  and hush puppies and a roll. My friend ordered the brisket plate with the same sides.

We sat down and waited while it was prepared. There were five homemade sauces on the table to add to the BBQ. It is a true slowly smoked pork and brisket without sauce. The customer can add which ever they twant. I tried each and all were very good. The pork was delicious and the homemade yeast roll was tender and excellent. Now about those hush puppies , the best I have ever had anywhere. Believe me I have tasted many hush puppies over the years.

When Barry who owns That Good BBQ, came to our table we had a nice conversation and learned a little about him and his background. I can say without a doubt he knows how to give his customers a great food experience. I will drive the 1 1/2 hours to have this BBQ again. Do go to his website and read his story. 

Barry thank you and I will be back.

Diana Dean

data.title: Before work
data.text: Stopped by for a sandwich before work.  Excellent BBQ  Biscuit sandwich with mild sauce.  Friendly helpful staff.  The young girl told me about the daily. Fresh baked cookies.  Then she reminded me they are closed on Mondays

data.title: Second Time's A Charm
data.text: I visited That Good BBQ this first month it was open and was not impressed. The Pork BBQ was good, but I found the portions to be inadequate. Since then, I visited several more times and believe that this restaurant has gotten its act together. Good BBQ and sides at a reasonable price.

data.title: Best brisket since Texas
data.text: We lived in Texas for 6 years,  and this is the best brisket we've had since.  It is so good!  Sides of baked beans and coleslaw were spot on. We will be regular customers

data.title: Great Barbeque
data.text: Excellent meal!!  Found this place on Trip Advisor. . . glad I did...great food, reasonable price....variety of sauces..

data.title: Love this place!
data.text: We've been here on both our trips to Suffolk. Excellent barbecue!! Cole slaw and baked beans are good...not great, but the atmosphere and friendly staff make up for that! We will come back again next time.
